content:
In Australia some vaccinations are marked to indicate 'given at birth'. The source systems use vaccine sequence number for this, with 'b'.
In STU3 would this be better as Immunization.vaccinationProtocol.series or as an extension on Immunization.vaccinationProtocol ?
@Craig Newman. But sounds like an extension to me
protocolApplied.description also exists but an extension seems reasonable
